outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this OUTPUT is to increase the participation of rural communities in the country's growth process by promoting rural development to reduce poverty, inequalities, and unemployment. A UN Interagency Support Task Team (to enhance coherence & complementarity) will work with national stakeholders to support the further articulation of national rural development policy, strategy, and programmes.  The task team will, jointly with the Department of Land Reform and Rural Development, develop a programme of support, which will contribute towards ensuring that small scale farming is integrated into the mainstream economy and faci

The purpose of this OUTPUT is to support the ongoing government initiatives to reduce unemployment among the youth.  In consultation with stakeholders and other youth formations, in particular the National Youth Development Agency (NYDA), a thorough analysis of lessons learned during the past years from within the country and abroad will be conducted with a view to informing the continuous articulation of inclusive and sustainable strategies to create job opportunities for the youth by also tapping on the available skills base. This approach to youth employment will also be informed by a National Youth Summit on youth job creation. The summit will be preceded by a series of consultations with stakeholders.

Develop a "White Paper on The Consolidation and  Repositioning of the  South African Public Service" which will guide all spheres of government in repositioning their service delivery initiatives to ensure accelerated service delivery for a developmental state

This OUTPUT aims to support Government initiative on eSkills for Capacity Building & Human Resource Development; eSkills for Business Development; eSkills for Improving Public Services & Strengthening Democratic Institutions; eSkills & Education Delivery; Researching & Evaluating eSkills; eSkills for Participation in Local Decision Making and eSkills for African Advancement & Enhancing International Cooperation.

outputs.output_title: Support to Fin and Ecos Instit

outputs.output_descr: The purpose of this activity is to support the South African government to develop a  sustainable mechanism to use social protection as an instrument for inclusive growth and promotion of equity.  This will also assist households to adopt an efficient strategy of coping with economic risks and shocks.  UNDP will support the revision of the social protection system  so that it does not discourage initiatives to work.   A knowledge-based management system that draws lessons and generates knowledge through the modality of South-South cooperation will be supported.
